string-array.name: club_desc
string-array.item: Futbol Club Barcelona, known simply as Barcelona and colloquially as Barça, is a professional football club based in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.
Real Madrid Club de Fútbol, ​​commonly known as Real Madrid, is a professional football club based in Madrid, Spain. Founded in 1902 as Madrid Football Club, traditionally wears white cage costumes.
Fußball-Club Bayern München e.V., also known as FC Bayern Munich, FC Bayern Munich, or FC Bayern, is a German sports club based in Munich, Bavaria.
Manchester City Football Club (also known as Man City or The Citizens) is a professional football club from England that plays in the English Premier League.
Manchester United Football Club is a professional English football club based at Old Trafford, Greater Manchester, which plays in the English League.
Associazione Calcio Milan, often referred to as A.C. Milan or just Milan, is an Italian football club based in Milan, Lombardy, which plays in Serie A.
Arsenal Football Club (also known as Arsenal or the Gunners) is a professional English football club based in Holloway, London. was founded in 1886 with the name Dial Square.
